titleStmt.title: The straights voyage, or, St. Davids poem being a description of the most remarkable passages that happened in her first expedition against the Turkes of Argeir, Sir John Harman, commander, Rere-Admiral of His Majesty's fleet, beginning May 1669, ending April 1671 / by John Baltharpe, belonging to the foresaid ship.
titleStmt.author: Baltharpe, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.C. for T. Vere ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
